dcterms:creator: J. Blitzer
M. Dredze
F. Pereira
dcterms:description: The SDA dataset contains Amazon product reviews for four different product types (Books, DVDs, Electronics, and Kitchen appliances) with binary sentiment labels. It includes 2.0K reviews for each domain, split into training and development sets, and a test set of 1.6K labeled reviews.
dcterms:title: SDA (Sentiment Domain Adaptation)

dcterms:creator: A. Conneau
R. Rinott
G. Lample
A. Williams
S. Bowman
H. Schwenk
V. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: The XNLI dataset focuses on the Natural Language Inference (NLI) three-way classification task, involving texts in 15 languages. Each language's training, development, and test sets contain 392.70K, 2.49K, and 5.01K samples, respectively, with English used as the source domain.
dcterms:title: XNLI (Cross-lingual Natural Language Inference)

dcterms:description: The MSS dataset is a multi-source sentiment dataset collected from Kaggle, containing reviews from various sources including Amazon, IMDB, TripAdvisor, and Yelp. It includes balanced training, development, and test sets.
dcterms:title: MSS (Multi-Source Sentiment dataset)
